mapper.select: SELECT swo.fo_id foId, swo.MN100_ID mn100Id, sm.merchant_id mechantId, sm.`code` mechantCode, swo.action action, swo.balance balance, swo.balance_xy balanceXy, swo.bank_fee bankFee, swo.checked_at checkedAt, swo.checked_man checkedMan, swo.completed_at completedAt, swo.confirm_accname confirmAccname, swo.confirmed_at confirmedAt, swo.confirmed_man confirmedMan, swo.created_at createdAt, swo.creator createdMan, swo.currency currency, swo.local_created_at localCreatedAt, swo.local_updated_at localUpdatedAt, swo.note note, swo.notify_url notifyUrl, swo.paid_amount paidAmount, swo.pay_bank_fee payBankFee, swo.pre_balance preBalance, swo.pre_balance_xy preBalanceXy, swo.rate rate, swo.reference reference, swo.request_amount requestAmount, swo.`status` `status`, swo.status_description statusDescription, swo.to_bank toBank, swo.to_card_number toCardNumber, swo.to_man toMan, swo.updated_at updatedAt, swo.updater updatedMan FROM system_withdrawal_order swo JOIN system_merchant sm ON swo.mechant_id = sm.merchant_id WHERE swo.fo_id = #{foId}
